Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Dana-Popescu
Reviews.Content: 3 star hotel rome pretty considering price clean pretty user mentioned tv italian programs hand dont rome spend time hotel breakfast actually expected downside pretty noisy due close stairway easily hear people stairs especially trouble sleeping staff ok transportation city center close hotel bus station bus bologna metro station 3 stations termini 5 stations colosseum bus 61 bologna metro station barberini metro station taking 3 day pass costs 11 euros trip costs 1 euro metro bus deal hotel considering price dont busy termini

Reviews.Title: “too noisy”
Reviews.Author: Tracy B
Reviews.Content: supposed romantic break honeymoon didnt walls thin family yelling child child cried time corridor disappeared party students arrived worse control shouting screaming banging doors 2am husband door told quiet people trying sleep night staff husband asleep sofa covered clean plenty hot water

Reviews.Title: “Guenstiges Hotel fuer Rom Trip mit guter Verkehrsanbindung”
Reviews.Author: Jeanny13
Reviews.Content: nice little hotel 10 minutes bologna metro station foot 5 metro stops colosseo sightseeing starts cleaniness ok walls fairly thin hear neighbor snore bring ear plugs decent size bathroom sightseeing trip dont spend time hotel perfect cheap price makes worth breakfast free internet televison italian except mtv sometimes english

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Simple”
Reviews.Author: mc0z
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel weekend visiting rome explore sights hotel located residential neighbourhood ten minute walk bologna metro station healthy walk sights approximately 40 minute walk colosseum hour approx 8 km walk vatican city staying comfortable taking metro lines walking distance hotel clean simple frills breakfast basic continental style paid positive experience shuttle service offered airport price staff pleasant note ladies bring own hairdryer supplied takes job

Reviews.Title: “Basic but nice with GREAT nearby restaurant”
Reviews.Author: P G
Reviews.Content: 2011 stayed night beginning trip staff friendly little redecoration clean comfortable beds tv fridge etc staff accommodating requested additional pillows nice continental minute walk bologna metro station easy map hotel sell metro tickets bonus local restaurant 2 mins walk rosso tourist restaurant pizzas huge seafood pasta dishes mushroom risotto evening meals 10 day trip menu items funny english translations mushroom steak grate food delicious cheap house red wine hotel door street walk approx 50 metres main road rosso restaurant opposite road diagonally left enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Just fine”
Reviews.Author: Oxinja
Reviews.Content: hotel fashioned located city centre close bologna metro station requested double bed single beds wasnt english channels didnt matter didnt spend time hotel breakfast basic continental ham cheese fruit cereal buns sweet pastries juicecoffee delicious machine found receptionists unfriendly basic hotel bathroom clean wi fi connection free fast didnt pay couldnt expect

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: JerseyBenp
Reviews.Content: hotel stay budget break rome location hard taxi drivers 34 ours heard staff friendly breakfast chesse ham yougurts cleaned shower nice powerfull hotel restaraunt 2 mins dinner priced budget

Reviews.Title: “Did the job nicely, not fancy but perfectly adequate”
Reviews.Author: MikeJLondon
Reviews.Content: 60 inlaws wife 2 rome stayed 4 nights airport yes isnt central isnt bad located nice restaurants shops 10 minute walk nearest underground station centre 10 minutes hotel quiet service functional overly friendly inbetween breakfast greatlots eat drink continental style taxi ride rome 15 euros

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: moominmobile
Reviews.Content: decided stay based remarks left website genuine 3 hotel heart city 1015 min walk ne bologna metro station remarkably value maintained hotel 61 bus stops via 3 mins hotel useful bus city centre walk bologna metro nomentana rail station 1520 minutes walk hotel choose airport line meaning worry changing trains losing bearings hotel situated quiet residential street surrounded apartments main road lovely quiet municipal swimming pool door main impression walking lobby smart modern hotel kept maintained dining breakfast outside terrace attached al fresco breakfasts continental style ham cheese rolls yoghurts juice coffee generously sized clean maintained double stayed huge bed walls carpets bedding clean bathroom excellent shower bath bidet airconditioning reception switch arrive tv cable bbc world mini fridge stayed milan supposedly 3 hotel extremely disappointed shabbiness poor maintenance hotel keen buck trend stay hesitation
